page.title: 01Cropwell Bishop, Gazetteer.
page.content: This Domesday Block, 04680333, contains two main centres of population,the larger village of {Cropwell Bishop}and the much smaller village of{Colston Bassett.}The remainder of the Block comprises open rural countryside largely intensively farmed. The area lies some 10 miles south-east of Nottingham, with Grantham, Melton Mowbray,Newark and Leicester being the other nearest commercial and recreation centres. { MR. A.L.CESSFORD.(TEACHER) { {PAGE CONTENTS:}2,Quarries;3,Leisure; 4,C.Bassett-description;5,Stables; 6,Butcher;7,Village Hall;8,Agric.Mchnt 9,Creamery;10,Vicarage;11,Day in my life;12,As pg.11;13,As pg.4;14,As pg.13;15,As pg.14;16,The Cobbler; 17,C.Bassett Schl.;18,As pg.10; 19,C.Bishop Schl.;20,Religion.
